original_text: Rehoboam arrived back in Jerusalem. He brought together all the men from the tribes of Judah and Benjamin who knew how to fight. There were 180,000 of them. Rehoboam wanted to attack the Israelite tribes so that he could rule them again as king.
korean_text: 르호보암이 예루살렘에 이르러 유다와 베냐민 족속을 모으니 택한 용사가 십팔만 명이라 이스라엘과 싸워 나라를 회복하여 르호보암에게 돌리려 하더니

sentences.original_text: He brought together all the men
from the tribes of Judah and Benjamin
Rehoboam wanted to attack the Israelite tribes
so that he could rule them again as king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 다시 왕으로서 그들을 다스릴 수 있도록.
